comment: By far the best professor I had while at KSU. She cares so much about her students and always willing to help in anyway. She wants you to succeed and love teaching. She gave extra credit just for showing up:)))

TAKE HER I repeat TAKE HER!!!! Professor Killian is the best professor. She is truly on your side she is the best  professor and she is so sweet. She is fresh out the field and will give you the best experience and advice that she can give you. Love professor Killian. I will take her again. Thats how good she is.

Ms.Killian is AWESOME! It is her first year at KSU and she is one of the best professors I have had. Her lectures are very interesting and informational. She gives us lots of relevant information since she is fresh out of teaching elementary school. I am absolutely taking her next semester! If you can, take her!!
She is amazing! If you have the chance to take her, please do! She made all the stress of field work so much less stressful!

Professor Killan is amazing and it is her first year at KSU. I created my schedule early for next semester to make sure I was able to get into her course. She is comforting, caring, and passionate. She opened every class with a read aloud and prepared us for our field work experience. KSU needs more professors like her! Thank you Ms. Killian!

TAKE HER TAKE HER TAKE HER!!! You will not be disappointed I promise!!! I took her the first semester she was at KSU and she is so fresh from the field she knows exactly what she is talking about. She makes sure that every assignment is clear and easy to understand. This class is very field work oriented, and she gives you the tools you need.
